00044 template<class T>
00045 void parseEmfObject(const std::string& objectSerialized, T*& object_ptr, const std::string msgComp=std::string()) {
00046 
00047   object_ptr = NULL;
00048   try {
00049     //CREATE DATA MODEL
00050     T tmpObject;
00051     ecore::EPackage_ptr ecorePackage = tmpObject._eClass()->getEPackage();
00052     ecorecpp::MetaModelRepository::_instance()->load(ecorePackage);
00053 
00054     //Parse the model
00055     ecorecpp::parser::parser parser;
00056     object_ptr = parser.load(objectSerialized)->as< T >();
00057   }
00058   catch (std::exception& e) {
00059     throw SystemException(ERRCODE_INVDATA, msgComp);
00060   }
00061 
00062 }
